changeSet.author: baskaran radhakrishnan
changeSet.sql: insert into tbl_key_refer (gkey,KEYWORD1,KEYWORD2,KEYWORD3,KEYWORD4,KEYWORD5,KEYWORD6,DYNAWORD1,DYNAWORD2,TABLENAME,FIELDNAME,WHERECOND) values(2,'DATE JOINING','DOJ','JOINING DATE','DT JOINED','DTOFJOINING','','','','EMPLOYEE','EMP_DOJ','')

insert into tbl_key_refer (gkey,KEYWORD1,KEYWORD2,KEYWORD3,KEYWORD4,KEYWORD5,KEYWORD6,DYNAWORD1,DYNAWORD2,TABLENAME,FIELDNAME,WHERECOND) values(3,'EMAIL','EMAIL ID','EMAILID','EMAIL-ID','MAIL ID','','','','EMPLOYEE','EMP_EMAIL','')

insert into tbl_key_refer (gkey,KEYWORD1,KEYWORD2,KEYWORD3,KEYWORD4,KEYWORD5,KEYWORD6,DYNAWORD1,DYNAWORD2,TABLENAME,FIELDNAME,WHERECOND) values(4,'JOINERS','NEW JOINEE','JOINED','','','','THIS YEAR','CURRENT YEAR','EMPLOYEE','EMPLOYEE_ID,EMPLOYEE_NAME,EMP_ROLE,EMP_PROJECT,TO_DATE(EMP_DOJ,''DD-MON-RRRR'')','to_char(EMP_DOJ,''YYYY'') = to_char(sysdate,''YYYY'')')

insert into tbl_key_refer (gkey,KEYWORD1,KEYWORD2,KEYWORD3,KEYWORD4,KEYWORD5,KEYWORD6,DYNAWORD1,DYNAWORD2,TABLENAME,FIELDNAME,WHERECOND) values(5,'JOINERS','NEW JOINEE','JOINED','','','','LAST YEAR','PREVIOUS YEAR','EMPLOYEE','EMPLOYEE_ID,EMPLOYEE_NAME,EMP_ROLE,EMP_PROJECT,TO_DATE(EMP_DOJ,''DD-MON-RRRR'')','to_char(EMP_DOJ,''YYYY'') = to_char(sysdate,''YYYY'')-1')

insert into tbl_key_refer (gkey,KEYWORD1,KEYWORD2,KEYWORD3,KEYWORD4,KEYWORD5,KEYWORD6,DYNAWORD1,DYNAWORD2,TABLENAME,FIELDNAME,WHERECOND) values(6,'JOINERS','NEW JOINEE','JOINED','','','','THIS MONTH','CURRENT MONTH','EMPLOYEE','EMPLOYEE_ID,EMPLOYEE_NAME,EMP_ROLE,EMP_PROJECT,TO_DATE(EMP_DOJ,''DD-MON-RRRR'')','to_char(EMP_DOJ,''MMYYYY'') = to_char(sysdate,''MMYYYY'')')

insert into tbl_key_refer (gkey,KEYWORD1,KEYWORD2,KEYWORD3,KEYWORD4,KEYWORD5,KEYWORD6,DYNAWORD1,DYNAWORD2,TABLENAME,FIELDNAME,WHERECOND) values(7,'JOINERS','NEW JOINEE','JOINED','','','','LAST MONTH','PREVIOUS MONTH','EMPLOYEE','EMPLOYEE_ID,EMPLOYEE_NAME,EMP_ROLE,EMP_PROJECT,TO_DATE(EMP_DOJ,''DD-MON-RRRR'')','to_char(EMP_DOJ,''MMYYYY'') = to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),''MMYYYY'')')

insert into tbl_key_refer (gkey,KEYWORD1,KEYWORD2,KEYWORD3,KEYWORD4,KEYWORD5,KEYWORD6,DYNAWORD1,DYNAWORD2,TABLENAME,FIELDNAME,WHERECOND) values(16,'LEAVE TAKEN','LEAVE USED','USED LEAVE','','','','','','EMP_LEAVE_DETAILS','EMPLOYEE_ID,CL_USED,EL_USED,SL_USED','')
